kdl.prox.app
Class ExportXMLApp

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.app.ExportXMLApp

public class ExportXMLApp
extends java.lang.Object

Application that exports an entire database or part of it to an XML file for later import. The twin of ImportXMLApp. NB: Overwrites existing file if it exists. See src/xml/prox3db.dtd for the data format.

NB: Requires Xerces2 Java Parser 2.5.0 Release (or better), which must be ahead of the xerces.jar that comes with JDOM in the class path. Otherwise the output file's DOCTYPE tag will be missing "PROX3DB":

See Also:
ImportXMLApp

ExportXMLApp

public ExportXMLApp(java.io.File outputFile,
                    ImportExportType ioType,
                    java.lang.String exportSpec)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Full arg overload. Exports either the entire database or just the one aspect specified by the two optional args.

Parameters:
outputFile - XML file to export to. NB: will be overwritten if exists
ioType - aspect to export. null if exporting entire database
exportSpec - optional additional arg if ioType is non-null; names the aspect of the database to export. specifically:
  • ImportExportType.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE: object attribute name
  • ImportExportType.LINK_ATTRIBUTE: link attribute name
  • ImportExportType.CONTAINER_ATTRIBUTE: container attribute name
  • ImportExportType.CONTAINER: container name using unix-style path syntax. For example, to name 'c2' under 'c1' under the root: '/c1/c2'. Note that there
    Throws:
    java.lang.Exception
